results.title: Simvastatin impairs hippocampal synaptic plasticity and cognitive function in mice
results.text_hl: Clinical studies have also shown that @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ usage could cause reversible @<m>DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive function impairment@@@.

results.title: Lipid-core nanocapsules containing simvastatin improve the cognitive impairment induced by obesity and hypercholesterolemia in adult rats.
results.text_hl: Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@-LNC is a promising alternative therapy for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@.

results.title: HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin ameliorates trimethyltin neurotoxicity and cognitive impairment through reversal of Alzheimer's-associated markers.
results.text_hl: @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@HMG-CoA reductase@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ ameliorates @CHEMICAL_trimethyltin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C046488 @@@trimethyltin@@@ @DISEASE_Neurotoxicity_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D020258 @@@neurotoxicity@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@ through reversal of @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's@@@-associated markers.

results.title: High dose simvastatin and rosuvastatin impair cognitive abilities of healthy rats via decreasing hippocampal neurotrophins and irisin.

results.title: Cumulative effect of simvastatin, l-arginine, and tetrahydrobiopterin on cerebral blood flow and cognitive function in Alzheimer's disease
results.text_hl: Subjects with mild @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@ or mild @<m>DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@ (@DISEASE_Cognitive_Dysfunction @DISEASE_MESH:D060825 @@@MCI@@@) were sequentially treated with the @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@HMG-CoA reductase@@@ synthesis inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (weeks 0-16), @CHEMICAL_Arginine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001120 @@@l-arginine@@@ (weeks 4-16), and @CHEMICAL_sapropterin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C003402 @@@tetrahydrobiopterin@@@ (weeks 8-16).

results.title: Intranasal Carrier-Free Nanomodulator Addresses Both Symptomatology and Etiology of Alzheimer's Disease by Restoring Neuron Plasticity and Reprogramming Lesion Microenvironment.
results.text_hl: Therefore, we developed a carrier-free nanomodulator (NanoDS) through the self-assembly of @CHEMICAL_Donepezil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077265 @@@donepezil@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for direct nose-to-brain delivery.
